name: 爱登·舍尔
awards: 2015年 第5届美国评论家选择电视奖 喜剧类最佳女配角 (提名) 中产家庭 第六季
birth_place: 美国,加利福尼亚州,洛杉矶
introduction: Overview (3)Born	December 26, 1991 in Los Angeles, California, USABirth Name	Eden Rebecca SherHeight	5' 2" (1.57 m)Mini Bio (1)Eden was born December 26, 1991. She was raised in Los Angeles, California, where she resides with her family. Eden began acting at the age of 8, participating in school plays and local theater. She has done numerous commercials, including voice-over work. Eden also appeared in the short film Stuck (2001), a few years before landing a permanent role on ABC's short-lived sitcom Sons & Daughters (2006), as Carrie -- the precocious teenage niece. Shortly after hearing that her contract would not be renewed for a second season, Eden was soon booked to appear in episodes of Showtime's Weeds (2005) for its second run.She plays the role of Sue Heck, the middle child, in the TV series The Middle (2009).She also gained her first voice acting role as Star Butterfly in the Disney XD series Star vs. the Forces of Evil (2015).- IMDb Mini Biography By: friendzfan95Trivia (6)Mother is a teacherHas two siblingsHas 3 dogsEnjoys singing and taking theaterHas previously done various sketches on The Tonight Show with Jay Leno (1992).Is of Austrian Jewish, Russian Jewish, and Greek Jewish descent.Personal Quotes (17)I never want to sound preachy about youth and feminism, but I feel like there aren't enough young people coming out about their concerns and opinions.I went to public school my whole life. It was a performing arts school, so I can't say if it was a typical experience or not, because it's all I know.Someone was asking me what my favorite outfit is, and 100%, without a doubt in my mind, is my forever lazy.I have had just an excess of energy. That's why I've always been active.I feel very strongly that young women have regressed a little bit. But I do get all preachy about it.I live in a constant state of hyperbole.I don't realize how rare it is to genuinely have sincere love for everyone you work with. Especially in Hollywood,
